nodes.title: Consistently use static imports for Precondition checks
Add download instructions for the AAR
Don't try and directly invoke git in builds
Move token request URI generation into TokenRequest
Move request URI generation into AuthorizationRequest
Stricter null checks for authorization service parameters
Ensure that the auth request is re-created after switching browser
Actually write new AuthState to SharedPreferences
Unit tests for failure cases of CodeVerifierUtil
Throw JSONException if token_type field is missing from token response
Greater control over custom tab session creation
Allow explicit client authentication for fresh tokens
Do not add client_id by default on all token requests
Replace your-custom-scheme by "reverse domain name notation"
set content-type for dynamic registration request
Enhancement in ID token validation and demo app
Enhancement in reference of #127 and other functionalities
Allow proper error parsing with no error_description is given.
Explicitly reject construction of non-constructable types
Allow custom tab to remain in back stack
Use new AppAuth branding in demo app and README
Tool version updates, corrected properties for JavaDoc and keystore
Added ability to pass CustomTabsCallback when building CustomTabsIntent.
Check Response Code before using conn.getInputStream
Extra flag required to retrieve all browsers on M+
Fixes and manual test capability for browser selection
Introduce ability to control creation of HttpUrlConnection instances
Implementation of browser filtering for authorization requests
Remove duplicate scope constants (moved to AuthorizationRequest)
Ensure state param in response matches request
Use an intermediary activity to manage the authorization flow
Disable old library version checks; we periodically update these manually
Dependency updates, gradle file cleanup and vector drawables
Disregard refresh token when deciding if access token is still fresh.
Fix for issue #88: handle missing registration endpoint
Add note about gradle check target in contribution guidelines.
Add additional resource links from I/O 2016
Updated CONTRIBUTING now that electronic signing is available.
Add example of client auth in token request.
Add link to enterprise SSO video
Adding Rahul to the CONTRIBUTORS list.
Fix #72 - avoid path encoding in config URIs
Add example of dynamic client registration in README.
Move response mode values to inner class
Move scope values to inner class
Split AuthorizationRequest tests into smaller units
Critical: Handle token refresh request without client auth.
Compare restored state against original state.
Remove build version hack required for older android gradle plugin
Normalize names and documentation of JSON serialization methods
Amend copyright headers to reflect plurality of authors
Be more lenient about refresh tokens
[WIP] Support client authentication at token endpoint
[WIP] OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration support
Store OAuth related authorization exceptions on updates
Be less opinionated about the token request URI
Test coverage and fixes for AuthState
Add support for OpenID Connect 1.0 display param
Add support for OpenID Connect 1.0 prompt param
Added documentation for adding intents to the AndroidManifest.xml.
Remove old constants from AuthorizationService, clean up tests
Add note to README.md to remind about persisting fresh tokens
Upgrade testing to roboelectric4 and use androidx.test
Add ability to skip issuer https check and token nonce verification
Restore backwards compatible of configuration constructor
Added missing custom tabs query to manifest
Add methods to request access token synchronous
Add HttpConnect wrapper for adding okHttp support
Add package visibility manifest query for accessing browsers on sdk 30
should not let developer specify the discovery endpoint url.
Invoke callback on registration response with missing parameters
Allow custom Executor to perform token refresh
Set scope to null when refreshing the token
Fix `Using access tokens` snippet in the readme
Apply changes to allow token type support for new cognito login flow
Fix error handling for http errors everywhere
Force new Login Activity, clearing OLD activity.
Don't check for Intent.CATEGORY_BROWSABLE in isFullBrowser
Use ConnectionBuilder to call userinfo endpoint
update gradle to version gradle-5.1.1 and buildToolsVersion to 28.0.3
Support for ending session, edited to use as library
Allow dcr with initial access token
Update AuthState serialization/deserialization methods in readme
Issue #402: fixes NPE in case input stream is null
And 1517 fix scopes and client secret
And 1515/refactor app auth to support multiple scopes
Implement ID Token validation according to OIDC spec
Custom Tabs was first added in Samsung Internet 4.0
Respect default browser of the user
Add support for custom tabs in Firefox
Do not override tab title setting
Do not automatically pass scope on token exchange request
Fix encoding of client ids and secrets for auth
Add myself to the AUTHORS file
Make handling of non-standard expires_at more tolerant
Synchronizes multiple actions when requiring token refresh
This update just fixes issue to configure DEMO application.
Updated references to the OAuth 2.0 for Native Apps BCP.
Fix lint error in demo app
Update gradle plugin and support lib versions
Return exception on cancelation, update README
